accessibility_about_us.comment: Text on button or link that redirects to the About us page.

accessibility_accurate_cross_team_subtit.comment: Label used in stats for cross success percentage (accurate/total)

accessibility_accurate_cross_team_title.comment: Label used in stats for accurate crosses per match

accessibility_accurate_long_balls_subtit.comment: Label used in stats for Successful long balls percentage. accurate/total.

accessibility_accurate_long_balls_team_s.comment: Label used in stats for successful long balls percentage (accurate/total)

accessibility_accurate_long_balls_team_t.comment: Label used in stats for accurate long balls per match

accessibility_accurate_long_balls_title.comment: Label used in stats for accurate long balls per 90

accessibility_accurate_pass_per_90.comment: Label used in stats for shot accurate passes per 90 min

accessibility_advertise.comment: Text on button or link that redirects to the About us page with information about how to buy advertising.

accessibility_aerials_won_percent.comment: Stat indicating how many aerial duels the player or team has won

accessibility_age_confirmation.comment: Popup header - used when a user needs to consent to being 18+.

accessibility_age_confirmation_button_ne.comment: Button indicating if user is below the age limit. The placeholder is the age. So it can be "Below 18"

accessibility_age_confirmation_button_po.comment: Button indicating if user is above the age limit. The placeholder is the age. So it can be "18+" or "18 and over"

accessibility_age_confirmation_subtitle.comment: Popup subtext - used when a user needs to verify his age to display betting odds
accessibility_age_confirmation_subtitle.value: Untuk menampilkan lainnya, kami harus memverifikasi usia kamu.

accessibility_alerts_disabled.comment: Meant for VoiceOver. Lets the user know that a match has alerts off when in the detailed match-controller

accessibility_alerts_enabled.comment: Meant for VoiceOver. Lets the user know that a match has alerts on when in the detailed match-controller

accessibility_all_competitions.comment: Label as a header for all the leagues/tournaments/competitions that are playing on a particular day.

accessibility_all_leagues.comment: Header indication you can set alerts that applies to all your favorite leagues

accessibility_all_players.comment: Header indication you can set alerts that applies to all your favorite players

accessibility_all_set_text.comment: The user is done guessing who the winners will be and gets the option to sign in to save their predictions.
accessibility_all_set_text.value: Semua siap! Masuk untuk menyimpan prediksimu.

accessibility_all_stats.comment: Text shown on a link that lets the user see all the stats.

accessibility_all_teams.comment: Header indication you can set alerts that applies to all your favorite teams

accessibility_app_notifications_off_desc.comment: Text appearing when app notifications are off.
accessibility_app_notifications_off_desc.value: Anda telah menonaktifkan Notifikasi untuk FotMob

accessibility_assist_by.comment: Shown in match facts when a player got an assist for a goal. Example: "Assist by Lionel Messi"

accessibility_attacking_threat.comment: Used as header for Momentum / Attacking Threat graph in match facts. As the match ebbs and flows, this statistic tracks how likely the team in possession is to score a goal.

accessibility_attempt_saved.comment: A shot result description (attempt saved by keeper)

accessibility_by_date.comment: Text shown on toggle that shows matches in a league sorted by date.

accessibility_by_round.comment: Text shown on toggle that shows matches in a league or tournament sorted by round.

accessibility_calendar_hint.comment: Meant for VoiceOver. Hint for a calendar button where the user can change which the date for the matches they want to see

accessibility_career_stats.comment: Text shown on tab header for tab that shows the career stats for a player.

accessibility_careers.comment: Text on button or link that redirects to the About us page with information about career opportunities.

accessibility_change_language_explanatio.comment: Label indicating you can change the language of the app
accessibility_change_language_explanatio.value: Lanjut ke Pengaturan dan ketuk Bahasa untuk memilih bahasa yang kamu inginkan untuk FotMob.\n\nJika pengaturan bahasa tidak tersedia, maka buka pengaturan bahasa perangkat untuk menetapkan pilihan bahasa.

accessibility_city.comment: Text shown for venue on a match if do not have a link to it.

accessibility_club_team.comment: This is a header to indicate the team club a player plays on when he is playing for the national team. So for Ronaldo it would be "Club => Manchester United". Feel free to translate it to the same as the "Team" translation if Team and Club is the same in your language.

accessibility_coach_win_percentage.comment: Percentage of games won out of total played.

accessibility_company.comment: Text on button or link that redirects to the About us page with information about our company.

accessibility_cookie_policy.comment: Text shown on link that redirects to the page that shows the cookie policy document.

accessibility_crosses_succeeeded.comment: Number of successful crosses for a player in a match

accessibility_crosses_succeeeded_accurac.comment: Number of successful crosses for a player in a match measured in percent

accessibility_date.comment: Text shown in table header for cells that show the date a match was played.

accessibility_days.comment: A label below a number indicating how many days are left until tournament starts

accessibility_defending.comment: A section header for defending stats for a football player. Below are things like tackles and recoveries

accessibility_defensive_actions.comment: Football (soccer) stat to describe how many defensive actions a player has made. A defensive action is an attempt to win back possession of the ball, like tackles, interceptions, clearances, blocks and aerial duels.

accessibility_defensive_actions_explaine.comment: Explains what defensive actions are. Use the same terminology as in the "defensive_actions" and the other relevant stat names.
accessibility_defensive_actions_explaine.value: Aksi bertahan termasuk semua upaya menekel, menghalangi, menyapu bersih, pelanggaran, dan memotong operan.

accessibility_delete_account.comment: Button that the user can click to delete his FotMob account so all his data is removed from our servers.

accessibility_delete_account_auth_prompt.comment: Button that the user can click to log out and delete his FotMob account so all his data is removed from our servers.
accessibility_delete_account_auth_prompt.value: Anda akan diminta untuk masuk lagi untuk memverifikasi identitas Anda sebelum kami dapat menghapus data Anda.

accessibility_delete_account_description.comment: Button that the user can click to log out and delete his FotMob account so all his data is removed from our servers.
accessibility_delete_account_description.value: Anda yakin ingin menghapus akun Anda? Ini tidak dapat dibatalkan.

accessibility_detailed_goal_data.comment: Used for expandable button on goal types in player profile.

accessibility_detailspage_group_stage.comment: Heading over readonly view of the users preditions on the group stage

accessibility_detailspage_reset.comment: Text on button for users to reset their current predictions.

accessibility_direct_free_kick.comment: A shot setup description. Goal was scored via a free kick.

accessibility_dribbled_past.comment: This is a statistic where we list the number of times a defender was dribbled past by an opponent.

accessibility_duel_won_percent.comment: Duel over the possession of the ball where a player wins the ball

accessibility_effective_clearance_per_90.comment: Label used in stats for clearances per 90

accessibility_enable_push_description_li.comment: Description for push reminder for live activities
accessibility_enable_push_description_li.value: Aktifkan notifikasi otomatis untuk mendapatkan pembaruan pertandingan langsung di layar kunci Anda

accessibility_europa_conference_league_p.comment: This is a brand new league by UEFA. Details here:  https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/UEFA_Europa_Conference_League. Indicates that the team can participate in the playoffs for this tournament.

accessibility_events.comment: Used as a header for a tab that lets the user see the events log for a match. Keep it short.

accessibility_expected_goals_non_penalty.comment: Expected goals from shots that are not penalties. Keep the "xG" part as it is.

accessibility_expected_goals_on_target_f.comment: Keep xGOT in the translation and check translation of expected_goals_on_target. This is a keeper stat and it is the Expected Goals on Target value of the opposition team. So if a keeper has conceded 1 goal and the opposition team has a xGOT value of 2.2 the keeper has done well since based on xG on target they should have scored 2.2 goals.
Label used in stats for expected goals on target conceded per 90 min for keepers.

accessibility_facts.comment: The main tab for the match facts. Needs to be kept short.

accessibility_fast_break.comment: A shot setup description. Goal was scored as part of a counter attack.

accessibility_favorites_widget_display_b.comment: Used as the display body for the favorites widget in the widget selection menu. Body of a widget that shows the matches you are following.
accessibility_favorites_widget_display_b.value: Tonton pertandingan yang Anda ikuti dengan info terkini

accessibility_favorites_widget_display_t.comment: Used as the display name for the favorites widget in the widget selection menu. Title of a widget that shows the matches you are following.

accessibility_fifa_rank.comment: Used as header for a list that displays all countries and their respective fifa ranking (e.g 1st - Belgium)

accessibility_finals_loser.comment: Description of team that lost match. Eg. "Loser SF1 vs Loser SF2"

accessibility_first_extra_time_half_shor.comment: Used for first extra time half short name in matchfacts. Must be as short as possible as it's a button title for pretty small toggle buttons

accessibility_first_half_short.comment: Used for first half short name in matchfacts. Must be as short as possible as it's a button title for pretty small toggle buttons

accessibility_follow_in_the_app.comment: Text shown in predictor to make the user want to download the app.

accessibility_follow_in_the_app_descript.comment: Describes the app so the user will want to download it.
accessibility_follow_in_the_app_descript.value: Akses prediksi, poin, dan liga langsung dari aplikasi FotMob Android/iOS.

accessibility_follow_leagues.comment: Header in the onboarding where you can choose your favorite leagues

accessibility_follow_leagues_to_set_noti.comment: Used for subtitle on toast from settings if user is not following any leagues.

accessibility_follow_players_to_set_noti.comment: Used for subtitle on toast from settings if user is not following any players.

accessibility_follow_teams_to_set_notifi.comment: Used for subtitle on toast from settings if user is not following any teams.

accessibility_fotmob_is_the_essential_ap.comment: Text shown in predictor to make the user want to download the app.

accessibility_fouls_committed_per_90.comment: This is a number for how many free kicks a player concedes on average during 90 minutes

accessibility_fouls_per_match.comment: Label used in stats for fouls per match

accessibility_fouls_won.comment: Number of fouls a player has won in a match

accessibility_from_corner.comment: A shot setup description. Goal was scored from a corner.

accessibility_full_table.comment: String indicating that we will show a complete standings table with all the columns. See translation for short_table

accessibility_fullscreen.comment: Button text - click on it to open play-by-play in fullscreen.

accessibility_get_the_app.comment: Shown above the FotMob app download links.

accessibility_gfx_season_stats.comment: Used as a title on graphics card for with season stats. Very limited room. Find shortest possible version

accessibility_goal_type.comment: Used for goal types in player profile

accessibility_goalkeeping.comment: This is a header for goalkeeper stats like saves, goals conceded and more. May be translated as "Keeper stats" or "Goalkeeper stats" if there isn't a good translation for this.

accessibility_goals_and_assists.comment: Label used in stats for the sum of goals and assists

accessibility_goals_and_assists_per_90.comment: Label used in stats for the sum of goals and assists per 90 min

accessibility_goals_conceded_per_90.comment: Label used in stats for goals conceded per 90 for keepers.

accessibility_goals_per_90_subtitle.comment: Label used in stats for expected goals per 90 min

accessibility_goals_per_90_title.comment: Label used in stats for goals per 90 min

accessibility_goals_prevented.comment: Label used in stats for goals prevented for keepers.

accessibility_ground_duels_won.comment: This is a statistic where we list the number of times a football defender won a ground duel as opposed to an aerial duel.

accessibility_h2h_short.comment: Shortname of 'Head to head'. This tab shows how two teams have fared against each other in the past. Needs to be kept short. Use 'H2h' if it makes sense in the language

accessibility_header.comment: A shot type variant. Goal was scored via a header.

accessibility_header_search_placeholder.comment: Placeholder text for a search bar where the user can search for leagues, teams, players and news.

accessibility_hide_all.comment: Button that can be clicked to hide all the leagues you don't follow.

accessibility_highest_rank.comment: Label for field that shows a teams highest FIFA rank value.

accessibility_historical_table_positions.comment: Header indication a team's previous positions in the table. Example here: https://www.fotmob.com/teams/8650/history/liverpool
Header text over graph that shows a team's historical table positions.

accessibility_history.comment: Tab header for page with historical team data.

accessibility_individual_play.comment: A shot setup description. Goal was scored due to a solo effort. One player did it all himself.

accessibility_info_points_give.comment: button to open information about how points are given in a tournament
accessibility_info_points_give.value: Tampilkan informasi dan bagaimana poin diberikan

accessibility_insights.comment: Used as a header for a section which displays insights about each of the teams before a match.

accessibility_insights_average_goals_per.comment: Displayed next to an icon of the team. Example for Liverpool: [image of Liverpool logo] Average [2.3] goals per match

accessibility_insights_average_possessio.comment: Displayed next to an icon of the team. Although the variable is percentage, do not format this. We localize the formatting of the percentage value automatically. Correct example for Liverpool: [image of Liverpool logo] Have an average possession of [44 %]. Wrong example for Liverpool: [image of Liverpool logo] Have an average possession of [44] %. Where everything inside the brackets are variables.

accessibility_insights_average_stat.comment: The team averages a value for a particular stat. Example (image of Barcelona to the left of this text): "Average [shots on target per match]: [7.8]" where text inside brackets ([xxx]) are variables

accessibility_insights_bad_form_team.comment: Displayed next to an icon of the team. Example for Liverpool: [image of Liverpool logo] Have lost their last 7 matches

accessibility_insights_best_away.comment: The team is ranked some number for away games this season. Example: "Ranked 3rd away from home this season"

accessibility_insights_best_home.comment: The team is ranked some number for home games this season. Example: "Ranked 1st at home this season"

accessibility_insights_chances_created_r.comment: Displayed next to an icon of the team. Example for Liverpool: [image of Liverpool logo] Ranked [6th] in big chances created ([18] big chances)
accessibility_insights_chances_created_r.value: Peringkat %1$@ dalam peluang besar yang dibuat (%2$@ peluang besar)

accessibility_insights_clean_sheets.comment: The team has the record for not conceding a single goal in a match. Example: "Most clean sheets in the competition (5)"

accessibility_insights_goalless_away.comment: Displayed next to an icon of the team. Example for Liverpool: [image of Liverpool logo] Haven't scored in 4 away matches
accessibility_insights_goalless_away.value: Belum mencetak gol dalam %1$@ pertandingan tandang

accessibility_insights_goalless_home.comment: Displayed next to an icon of the team. Example for Liverpool: [image of Liverpool logo] Haven't scored in 3 home matches
accessibility_insights_goalless_home.value: Belum mencetak gol dalam %1$@ pertandingan kandang

accessibility_insights_goalless_team.comment: Displayed next to an icon of the team. Example for Liverpool: [image of Liverpool logo] Haven't scored in their last 4 matches
accessibility_insights_goalless_team.value: Belum mencetak gol dalam %1$@ pertandingan mereka

accessibility_insights_goals_conceded_te.comment: Displayed next to an icon of the team. Example for Liverpool: [image of Liverpool logo] Ranked [2nd] in goals conceded per match ([0.7] goals)
accessibility_insights_goals_conceded_te.value: Peringkat %1$@ dalam kemasukan gol per pertandingan (%2$@ gol)

accessibility_insights_goals_scored_team.comment: Displayed next to an icon of the team. Example for Liverpool: [image of Liverpool logo] Ranked [1st] in goals scored per match ([2.1] goals)
accessibility_insights_goals_scored_team.value: Peringkat %1$@ dalam gol yang dicetak per pertandingan (%2$@ gol)

accessibility_insights_goals_team.comment: Displayed next to an icon of the team. Example for Liverpool: [image of Liverpool logo] Have scored 12 goals in their last 5 matches
accessibility_insights_goals_team.value: Mencetak %1$@ gol dalam %2$@ pertandingan terakhir mereka

accessibility_insights_gone_without_win.comment: The team has not won in a particular number of consecutive away matches. Example: "Have gone 7 matches without a win"

accessibility_insights_good_form_team.comment: Displayed next to the icon of the team, so it is implicit that the team is the noun. Example for Liverpool: [image of Liverpool logo] Have won their last 7 matches.

accessibility_insights_lost_last_matches.comment: The team has lost a particular number of consecutive matches. Example: "Have lost their 5 last matches"

accessibility_insights_not_clean_sheet.comment: The team has not kept a clean sheet (conceded at least one goal) for a particular number of matches. Example: "Haven't kept a clean sheet in 7 matches"

accessibility_insights_not_won_at_home.comment: Displayed next to an icon of the team. Example for Liverpool: [image of Liverpool logo] Haven't won at home in their last (number greater than 2) matches
accessibility_insights_not_won_at_home.value: Belum menang di kandang dalam %1$@ pertandingan terakhir mereka

accessibility_insights_not_won_away.comment: Displayed next to an icon of the team. Example for Liverpool: [image of Liverpool logo] Haven't won an away game in their last (number greater than 2) matches
accessibility_insights_not_won_away.value: Belum menang laga tandang dalam %1$@ pertandingan terakhir mereka

accessibility_insights_not_won_team.comment: Displayed next to an icon of the team. Example for Liverpool: [image of Liverpool logo] Haven't won a match in 4 attempts

accessibility_insights_penalties_awarded.comment: The team has the record for getting penalties in a season. Example: "Have been awarded the most penalties this season (13)"
accessibility_insights_penalties_awarded.value: Sudah dihadiahi tendangan penalti terbanyak musim ini (%1$@)

accessibility_insights_penalties_concede.comment: The team has the record for conceding penalties in a season. Example: "Have conceded the most penalties this season (13)"
accessibility_insights_penalties_concede.value: Membobol paling banyak tendangan penalti musim ini (%1$@)

accessibility_insights_player_average_mi.comment: A player averages some value (typically 60-120) minutes per goal. Example: "[Mohammed Salah] averages [67] minutes per goal"

accessibility_insights_player_average_st.comment: A player averages some number for a stat. Example: "[Lionel Messi] averages [7.2] [shots on target]" %2$@ signifies the stat while %3$@ is the value, so feel free to swap these if that is appropriate for the language.

accessibility_insights_player_chances_cr.comment: A player which is one of the top players in terms of big chances created in the competition. Example: "Erling Haaland is ranked 1st in big chances created in the competition (20)"
accessibility_insights_player_chances_cr.value: %1$@ meraih peringkat %2$@ dalam peluang besar yang dibuat dalam kompetisi (%3$@)

accessibility_insights_player_goals_scor.comment: A player has the most scored for a competition. Example: "Mohammed Salah is the competition's top scorer (17)"
accessibility_insights_player_goals_scor.value: %1$@ adalah pencetak gol terbanyak selama kompetisi (%2$@)

accessibility_insights_player_most_chanc.comment: A player has created the most big chances for a given team. Example: "[Harry Kane] has created the most big chances for [Tottenham] ([17])"

accessibility_insights_player_most_shots.comment: A player has created the most shots on target per match for a given team. Example: "[Harry Kane] has the most shots on target per match for [Tottenham] ([1.4])"
accessibility_insights_player_most_shots.value: %1$@ memiliki tembakan paling banyak pada sasaran per pertandingan untuk %2$@ (%3$@)

accessibility_insights_player_most_x_for.comment: A player is the best in a given a stat for a given team. Example: "[Lionel Messi] has the most [yellow cards] for [Barcelona] (6)" where text inside brackets ([xxx]) are variables

accessibility_insights_player_rank_in_co.comment: A player is ranked some number in a stat this season. Example: "[Lionel Messi] is ranked [2nd] in [goals] in the competition (21)" where text inside brackets ([xxx]) are variables

accessibility_insights_player_saves_per_.comment: A player which is one of the top keepers in terms of saves per match in the competition. Example: "[Allison] is ranked [2nd] in saves per match in the competition ([1.2])"
accessibility_insights_player_saves_per_.value: %1$@ meraih peringkat %2$@ dalam tangkapan per pertandingan dalam kompetisi (%3$@)

accessibility_insights_player_scored_con.comment: A player has scored in X consecutive games. Example: "[Erling Haaland] has scored in [6] consecutive matches" where text inside brackets ([xxx]) are variables

accessibility_insights_player_scored_x_i.comment: A player has scored in X of a team's last Y matches. Example: "[Erling Haaland] has scored in [6] of [Dortmund]'s last [7] matches" where text inside brackets ([xxx]) are variables

accessibility_insights_rank_in_competiti.comment: The team is ranked an ordinal number in a particular stat in the competition/league. Example (image of Barcelona to the left of this text): "Ranked [2nd] in [goals scored per match] in the competition ([1.7])"" where text inside brackets ([xxx]) are variables

accessibility_insights_shots_on_target_t.comment: Displayed next to an icon of the team. Example for Liverpool: [image of Liverpool logo] Ranked [3rd] in shots on target per match ([4.2] shots)
accessibility_insights_shots_on_target_t.value: Peringkat %1$@ dalam tembakan ke gawang per pertandingan (%2$@ tembakan)

accessibility_insights_team_ranking.comment: The team is ranked an ordinal number in a particular stat. Example (image of Barcelona to the left of this text): "Ranked [2nd] in [goals scored per match] ([1.7])"" where text inside brackets ([xxx]) are variables

accessibility_insights_unbeaten_at_home.comment: The team has not lost in a particular number of consecutive home matches. Example: "Are unbeaten in 15 home games"

accessibility_insights_unbeaten_away.comment: The team has not lost in a particular number of consecutive away matches. Example: "Are unbeaten in 15 away games"

accessibility_insights_undefeated.comment: The team has gone a particular number of matches without losing. Example: "Undefeated in 7 matches"

accessibility_insights_undefeated_team.comment: Displayed next to the icon of the team, so it is implicit that the team is the noun. Example for Liverpool: [image of Liverpool logo] Haven't lost in 12 matches

accessibility_interception_team_title.comment: Label used in stats for interceptions per match

accessibility_interception_title.comment: Label used in stats for interceptions per 90

accessibility_international_clubs.comment: Header listing a list of tournaments where clubs from different countries participate. Like Champions League.

accessibility_interrupted.comment: A match status that indicates the match is temporarily suspended. Could be fans stormed the pitch of weather condiditions.

accessibility_interrupted_short.comment: Char limit is 2! A match status that indicates the match is temporarily suspended. Could be fans stormed the pitch of weather condiditions.

accessibility_invalid_code.comment: Error message indicating the code entered is invalid
accessibility_invalid_code.value: Tidak berhasil. Pastikan kamu memasukkan kode yang benar.

accessibility_is_favorite.comment: Meant for VoiceOver. A match/league/player etc. is part of your favorites

accessibility_joinleaguepopup_enter_code.comment: placeholder in text box for entering league

accessibility_joinleaguepopup_error.comment: Error message displayed when we cannot find a league with the given code

accessibility_joinleaguepopup_type_leagu.value: Ketik atau tempel kode ID Liga di kolom teks di bawah:

accessibility_live_activities_onboarding.comment: Used to inform the user that live activities can be changed in the team profile.

accessibility_live_activities_onboarding.comment: Description string used when onboarding users to auto live activities.

accessibility_live_activity_added.comment: Used in toast when activating a live activity

accessibility_overhead_kick.comment: Overhead kick of bicycle kick. Description is here https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bicycle_kick.  is an acrobatic strike where a player kicks an airborne ball rearward in midair. It is achieved by throwing the body backward up into the air and, before descending to the ground, making a shearing movement with the lower limbs to get the ball-striking leg in front of the other. In most languages, the manoeuvre is named after either the cycling motion or the scissor motion that it resembles.

accessibility_stats_comparison_explanati.value:
Diagram Ciri Pemain menyoroti kekuatan dan kelemahan statistik pemain, dibandingkan dengan pemain yang serupa.

Setiap statistik disesuaikan setiap 90 hari dan mencakup pertandingan dari 365 hari yang lalu.

Kemudian pemain dibandingkan dengan rekan seposisi dari liga yang sama, dan ditempatkan ke dalam peringkat persentil. Contoh, pemain dengan peringkat persentil 90% pada Peluang yang Diciptakan berarti mereka menciptakan lebih banyak peluang dibandingkan 90% pemain di posisinya di liga serupa.

Detail lengkap tentang perbandingan dapat dibaca di Pertanyaan Umum kami.

common_deepstats_explanation.value:
Semua data dikalkulasikan berdasarkan statistik yang ditampilkan oleh Opta.

Tingkatan pemain FotMob dikalkulasikan berdasarkan lebih dari 100 statistik perorangan per pemain dan pertandingan.

Sebuah pertandingan dalam tingkatan per pertandingan adalah setiap pertandingan dimana setiap peserta terlibat meskipun ia mulai menjadi pemain pengganti di beberapa menit terakhir.

Seorang pemain harus bermain sedikitnya 50% dari semua pertandingan yang menjadi bagian dari tingkatan-tingkatan.

Translate in a short and natural way similar to "Bad ads" in English. Do NOT translate literally as "Ad quality" or "Annonsens kvalitet". Also do not narrow it to only "Offensive ads" unless that is the only natural option in the language. The meaning should cover all kinds of ad complaints.

seo_ad_quality_hint.comment: A checkbox in a contact us form if people want to complain about the ad quality
seo_ad_quality_hint.value: Silakan bagikan detail tentang iklan, seperti pengiklan, di layar mana, video atau gambar, dan apa yang Anda anggap bermasalah.

seo_ai_generated.comment: Label used to indicate that content was generated using artificial intelligence.

seo_ai_team_news_summary_explanation.comment: Used in bottom sheet when clicking AI icon on team news summary to explain that the content is AI generated.
seo_ai_team_news_summary_explanation.value: Ringkasan ini dibuat oleh AI, berdasarkan artikel berita terbaru di FotMob. Setiap ringkasan terhubung ke artikel sumbernya.

seo_android_billing_disclaimer.comment: A legal disclaimer for in app subscription in the app for Google Play
seo_android_billing_disclaimer.value: Anda akan dikenai biaya secara otomatis pada akhir masa uji coba gratis Anda untuk jangka waktu dan harga langganan yang Anda pilih, kecuali Anda membatalkan setidaknya 24 jam sebelum akhir masa uji coba gratis Anda. Anda dapat membatalkan kapan saja di Google Play.

seo_annual.comment: Describing the duration for the annual FotMob+ subscription option.

seo_app_restart_fix.value: Untuk memperbaiki masalah Anda, silakan mulai ulang aplikasi.

seo_app_version.comment: Title for list item which has the app version as a subtitle.

seo_auto_save_failed.comment: Title for the dialogue that pops up when the auto save of the user's predictions fails.

seo_auto_save_failed_description.comment: Description text for the dialogue that pops up when the auto save of the user's predictions fails.
seo_auto_save_failed_description.value: Silakan coba muat ulang halaman atau keluar dan masuk kembali.

seo_blocked_or_muted_notifications.value: Beberapa notifikasi diblokir atau dibisukan. Buka Pengaturan untuk mengaktifkannya.

seo_bug.comment: Used for radio button in troubleshooting mail for choosing type of issue. And as a description for mail.

seo_distance_per_90.comment: A label indicating how long a player has run per 90 minutes.

seo_edit_name.comment: Text for button that opens the "edit user name"-dialogue.

seo_europacupqual.comment: This is a new tournament below the Champions League for Women. Official name is UEFA Women's Europa Cup https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/UEFA_Women%27s_Europa_Cup

seo_expires_in.comment: Used to indicate when the subscription is expiring. From 0 to many days. Use "today" and "tomorrow" for 0 and 1 if that makes sense for that language.

seo_expires_today.comment: Used to indicate when the subscription is expiring today. We need this string in addition to the plural string "expires_in" because many languages don't support the "zero" instance which is what we need for "today".

seo_expires_tomorrow.comment: Used to indicate when the subscription is expiring tomorrow. We need this string in addition to the plural string "expires_in" because many languages don't support the "one" instance which is what we need for "tomorrow".

seo_family_annual.comment: Describing the duration for the annual family FotMob+ subscription option.

seo_fifa_rankings_women.comment: Link text for link to a page with the FIFA ranking table for women.

seo_final_third_passes.comment: Passes in the final third of the pitch. Will be written below a "Passes" header as "Final third 75 (97%)"

seo_h2h_summary.comment: Text summarisng the outcomes of the previous matches between the two teams. With parameters in order; home team name, number of home team wins, away team name, number of away team wins and number or draws.
seo_h2h_summary.value: Rekor head to head saat ini untuk tim adalah %2$@ kemenangan %1$@, %4$@ kemenangan %3$@, dan %5$@ hasil imbang.

seo_monthly.comment: Describing the duration for the monthly FotMob+ subscription option.

seo_physical_metrics.comment: A header representing the phyical metrics section of a match

seo_play_fotmob_predict.comment: Button text for button that opens the "FotMob Predict" game. Do not translate FotMob Predict.

seo_play_offs_draw.comment: Label as a header for the matches that will be part of a random draw which will decide which teams meet each other in the play off matches.

seo_play_offs_explanation.comment: A description of the new draw format used in Champions League, Europa League and Conference League. Please keep the \n placements in the English string when doing the translation.
seo_play_offs_explanation.value: Pertandingan play-off ditentukan melalui undian. Dalam setiap grup, dua tim di sebelah kiri diundi melawan dua tim di sebelah kanan untuk membuat dua pertandingan play-off. Play-off dimainkan dalam dua pertandingan, dengan pemenang langsung melaju ke babak 16 besar.\n\nTerdapat undian terpisah untuk babak 16 besar menggunakan proses yang sama.

seo_play_offs_format.comment: Label leading to an explanation of the new Champions league play-off format

seo_play_predict_prevail.comment: Catchy slogan for the predictor game, used front and center on the predictor game page. Capture the essence of predicting, competing and winning. Be creative! The flow is more important than the order. Try alliteration, but not a must. NEEDS to be separated by periods.

seo_player_started_matches.comment: Label below the number of matches a player has been part of starting eleven. Keep short.

seo_playing_home.comment: Text explaining that the first team is playing at home against the visiting team at a given time.

seo_playing_home_at_stadium.comment: Text explaining that the first team is playing at home against the visiting team at the given statium at a given time.

seo_predict_edit_until_kick_off.comment: Text for the second step in the predictor game, to explain that you can edit your predictions until the match starts.

seo_predict_onboarding_apps.comment: Text in onboarding of our predictor game. If the word "Predict" sounds weird in your language, please use "Guess" as a replacement.

seo_predictor_play_button.comment: Button label for starting the predictor game. Must be short and clearly signal the action of predicting match results.

seo_remove.comment: Used to let user know they can remove something

seo_saved_penalties_in_shootout.comment: Stat for the number of penalties saved in a penalty shootout.

seo_second_leg.comment: Used in match facts to indicate that the match is the second of two or more encounters (legs) between the two teams, commonly in the context of knockout or playoff competitions.

seo_share_link.comment: Text for the button that opens the share dialogue for the league invite link.

seo_since_x.comment: Subtitle used in membership page to indicate since which *year* they became a lifetime supporter. Like "Since 2023".

seo_site_description_aboutus_careers.comment: Meta description for the fotmob website about careers, where open postitions are listed
seo_site_description_aboutus_careers.value: Kami mencari pengembang, lihat posisi terbuka kami! FotMob adalah aplikasi penting untuk hari pertandingan. Dapatkan skor langsung, jadwal pertandingan, tabel, statistik pertandingan, dan berita personal dari lebih dari 500 liga sepak bola di seluruh dunia.

seo_site_description_faq.comment: Meta description tag value for FAQ page, with questions and anwsers to frequently asked questions.

seo_xg_table_explanation.comment: Text for explaining what the xG table is. The text has newline seperators in it.
seo_xg_table_explanation.value:
Tim peringkat tabel xG didasarkan pada statistik tujuan yang diharapkan (xG).

• Angka hijau berarti tim melakukan lebih baik dari yang diharapkan.
• Angka merah berarti tim melakukan lebih buruk dari yang diharapkan.
• Angka kecil di sebelah nilai xG menunjukkan beda antara kinerja yang diharapkan dengan kinerja aktual.

Untuk detail lebih lanjut mengenai cara penghitungannya, lihat Pertanyaan Umum.

seo_xg_table_header.comment: A label for choosing the xG table (also called Justice table) that shows the table based on expected points.

seo_xga_short.comment: Short for expected goals against. Used in table column header so should not be longer than 4 characters.

seo_xpts_explanation.comment: Explanation of the xG table. The text has newline separators in it.
seo_xpts_explanation.value:
Poin yang Diharapkan (xPts) mencerminkan jumlah poin yang diharapkan untuk diperoleh tim dari pertandingan, berdasarkan kualitas peluang yang diukur oleh Gol yang Diharapkan (xG).

xPts untuk pertandingan dihitung berdasarkan hasil memungkinkan yang disimulasikan menggunakan kualitas tembakan, diungkapkan sebagai xG. Poin penghargaan simulasi untuk menang, seri, atau kalah berdasarkan xG.

xPts terakumulasi sepanjang musim untuk membentuk 'tabel-xG', juga dikenal sebagai 'Tabel keadilan', yang memberikan tampilan alternatif kinerja tim di luar poin aktual yang diperoleh.

seo_xpts_explanation_green_numbers.comment: Explanation of the green numbers in the xG table. Underlying numbers refer to xG.
seo_xpts_explanation_green_numbers.value: Angka hijau menunjukkan nomor pokok lebih baik dibandingkan hasil aktual tim.

seo_xpts_explanation_link.comment: Link to the explanation of the xG table.

seo_xpts_explanation_red_numbers.comment: Explanation of the red numbers in the xG table. Underlying numbers refer to xG.
seo_xpts_explanation_red_numbers.value: Angka merah menunjukkan nomor pokok lebih buruk dibandingkan hasil aktual tim

seo_xpts_short.comment: Short for expected points. Used in table column header so should not be longer than 4 characters.

seo_you_joined_the_league.comment: Short text in a toast dialogue explaining they succesfully joined a league through an invite link.
